scripts.build: export NODE_ENV=production && npm run build --prefix=web-application && npx cap sync
scripts.build-staging: export NODE_ENV=staging && npm run build --prefix=web-application && npx cap sync
scripts.build-dev: export NODE_ENV=development && npm run build-dev --prefix=web-application && npx cap sync
scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV=development && concurrently "npm run dev --prefix=worker" "npm run dev --prefix=web-application"
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix=packages/shared && npm run test --prefix=packages/backend && npm run test --prefix=web-application
